backend/main.mo: Defines cemetery data types and comparison utilities for graves, deceased persons, alleys, and site content in the main Motoko actor.
feature_evidence.json: Report linking features to files, components, and tests for build 64 deployment and redeploy trigger creation.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend source files detailing UI behavior, hooks, and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base file defining CSS variables for light/dark themes and applying global background and border styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/publish-live.build64.txt: Operational marker file indicating build 64 should be published with no functional changes.
frontend/redeploy-trigger.build63.txt: Trigger file for forcing a redeploy of build 63 without altering application behavior.
frontend/redeploy-trigger.build64.txt: Build 64 redeploy trigger file used to generate a fresh CI artifact without changing logic.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling identity, actor initialization, authorization, error states, and route gating with lazy loading.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: UI screen notifying unauthorized users and providing a logout action.
frontend/src/components/ActorInitializat: Error screen shown when the backend actor fails to initialize, offering retry options.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminGrave: Admin interactive cemetery map allowing selection of graves for editing with status-based coloring.
frontend/src/components/admin/CemeteryLa: Admin interface for adding and removing alleys and graves in the cemetery layout.
frontend/src/components/admin/GraveEditD: Dialog for creating or editing a grave record, including status, owner, and deceased details.
frontend/src/components/admin/GraveManag: Admin grave list with search, pagination, and the ability to create new graves via a lazy‑loaded dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/imageEditi: Utility functions for loading, converting, and resizing images into Uint8Array data.
frontend/src/components/admin/ImageUploa: React component for selecting, previewing, resizing, and uploading images with progress tracking and removal support.
frontend/src/components/admin/ManagerDel: Admin UI for the Boss to add or remove manager principals with validation and mutation handling.
Generates a printable PDF summary of cemetery graves using HTML content and parish metadata.
frontend/src/components/admin/SiteConten: Admin form for editing site content sections and images including hero, footer, prayers, and cemetery info.
frontend/src/components/ConnectionStatus: Displays backend connection health, errors, and retry controls based on health check state.
frontend/src/components/FloatingLoginCon: Floating login button initiating Internet Identity authentication with simple error handling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays parish footer content with contact info, mass times, and bank account copy functionality.
frontend/src/components/GraveResultsList: Renders lists of grave search results for admins or public users with load‑more, status badges, and optional editing.
frontend/src/components/GraveSearch.tsx: Provides grave search with debounced full‑text filtering and separate admin/public data sources.
frontend/src/components/GraveTileMap.tsx: Displays cemetery layout with status‑colored grave tiles and a legend, using lazy mounting for alleys.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Shows site logo, parish title, theme toggle, and optional logout button based on authentication.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Renders homepage hero image, title, scripture quote, and intro text using dynamic site content.
frontend/src/components/LazyMount.tsx: Mounts heavy child components only when near viewport using intersection observer.
frontend/src/components/PrivatePreviewBa: Shows a banner indicating the app is in private preview mode for internal testing.
frontend/src/components/PrivatePreviewGa: Authentication gate showing a login prompt when private preview mode is active and the user is not authenticated.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal form for entering and saving a user's name and optional email on first use.
frontend/src/components/PublicSectionsTi: Grid of selectable public section tiles that trigger navigation via onSelect.
frontend/src/components/SiteContentLoadE: Alert banner displaying a warning message when site content fails to load.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAuthorization: Determines whether the authenticated principal is Boss or manager and allowed to access admin features.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendHealthCheck: Health check hook that pings the backend via the actor and exposes connection status with auto‑retry.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Provides a hook that returns a value updated only after a specified debounce delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Defines a context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state and login/logout actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useInView.ts: Implements an IntersectionObserver-based hook to detect when an element enters the viewport.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrivatePreviewMode: Tracks private preview mode using URL parameters and session storage to enable or disable the mode.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls with React Query hooks for data fetching, mutations, and error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes, layout, and component styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Renders the admin dashboard with tabbed navigation and lazily loaded management tools.
frontend/src/pages/PublicPage.tsx: Displays the public site with hero content, section tiles, and tabbed access to search and map features.
frontend/src/utils/authErrors.ts: Provides helpers to detect specific authorization, connectivity, and access-control initialization errors based on message text.
frontend/src/utils/graveFullTextSearch.t: Implements normalized text indexing and in‑memory full‑text search for grave records in admin and public modes.
frontend/src/utils/graveStatusStyles.ts: Maps grave status values to consistent Tailwind styling, labels, legend colors, and badge variants.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning parameters from URL hashes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, themes, animations, and utilities for the project's design system.
project_state.json: Describes project metadata, current build state, existing features, and deployment notes.
